mapper.update: UPDATE NEWS_BOARD_DETAIL SET NEWS_BOARD_DETAIL_IMAGE_ROUTE =#{newsBoardDetailImageRoute}, NEWS_BOARD_DETAIL_IMAGE_NAME = #{newsBoardDetailImageName}, NEWS_BOARD_DETAIL_IMAGE_EXTENTION = #{newsBoardDetailImageExtention}, NEWS_BOARD_DETAIL_TITLE = #{newsBoardDetailTitle} WHERE NEWS_BOARD_DETAIL_ID = #{newsBoardDetailId}
UPDATE NEWS_BOARD SET NEWS_BOARD_TITLE = #{newsBoardTitle} WHERE NEWS_BOARD_ID = #{newsBoardId}
